categories: Category:Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game Wave I

nodes.text: The Y-Wing Expansion Pack is a supplement to the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game from Fantasy Flight Games. The expansion features a detailed miniature of the BTL Y-wing starfighter. It was released on September 14, 2012 as part of the game's first wave of expansions.

Known across the galaxy as a rugged and durable starfighter, the Y-wing boasts superior armament, armor, and shielding, and can also be upgraded with an incapacitating ion cannon to disable enemy ships. The Y-Wing Expansion Pack for the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game includes one pre-painted, highly detailed Y-wing miniature (plus its necessary dial and tokens), as well as Ship cards for crack shot Horton Salm and three additional skilled pilots capable of supporting any Rebel squadron. (Not a Complete Game.
The Y-Wing Expansion Pack contains one miniature, plus a maneuver dial and action tokens, as well as pilot and upgrade cards.
